Event: which case? I got a new one last week and I`m not thrilled at all with mine.
Post:
"I'm always disappointed with the presents I get. It's like people don't even try to understand what I really want."

This post displays a stable attributional style because it attributes the cause of the event (being disappointed with presents) to a chronic and long-lasting factor (people not understanding what they really want). It implies that the person's disappointment is not just a one-time occurrence, but rather a consistent pattern that can be expected to continue in the future.
